alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 1:00PM PDT until April 14 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Mountain Snow this Evening through Thursday... .A storm system will create hazardous driving conditions in the mountains above 4,500 feet this evening into Thursday afternoon and through 11 pm PDT Thursday night for elevations above 5,500 feet. Motorists should plan ahead for delays and chain controls and are encouraged to check with CalTrans for the latest road conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM PDT THURSDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Travel will be very difficult. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches, with locally higher amounts, are expected. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada above 5,500 feet. * WHEN...5 PM today to 11 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
